thread.section_title: Mainely Urns Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mainely Urns | mainelyurns.com | 2 of 63
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: I wanted a plaque and stand to place in front of my father's urn in a glass fronted niche. I wanted a picture of my father on the plaque and needed something that would stand the test of time. The Mainely plaque was beautifully engraved and I couldn't believe how well the engraved picture came out. However, I wish they had more sizes to chose from and something in a rectangular format.
